structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Notice Of Right To Declare Homestead Protection Required In All Mortgage Transactions
law.text: [Text of section applicable as provided by 2010, 395, Sec. 3.] In all mortgage transactions, the closing attorney or settlement agent shall provide the mortgagor with notice of the right to declare homestead protection pursuant to this chapter, receipt of which shall be acknowledged in writing by the mortgagor. The notice shall include, but not be limited to, a summary of the differences between the automatic homestead protection and the enhanced benefits acquired by making a declaration of homestead.
